CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc New Chiefs?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc New Chiefs is arc {Bensonborough Storm}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc New Chiefs?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc New Chiefs is arc {Poolechester Dynasty}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {New Chiefs} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {East Rovers} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Poolechester Dynasty to New Chiefs in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Poolechester Dynasty to East Rovers in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from New Chiefs to Poolechester Dynasty in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Rebeccaview Dolphins and Bensonborough Storm in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Rebeccaview Dolphins and Bensonborough Storm is {192}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Rebeccaview Dolphins and East Rovers in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Rebeccaview Dolphins and East Rovers is {523}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Poolechester Dynasty?
SC.A: The total flow output from Poolechester Dynasty is {857}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by New Chiefs?
SC.A: The total flow input by New Chiefs is {974}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 670? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {695} from {New Chiefs} to {East Rovers}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 264? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {103} from {Bensonborough Storm} to {Rebeccaview Dolphins}, a flow of {192} from {Rebeccaview Dolphins} to {Bensonborough Storm}, a flow of {196} from {New Chiefs} to {Poolechester Dynasty}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 264 and 520? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {333} from {East Rovers} to {Poolechester Dynasty}, a flow of {518} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {East Rovers}, a flow of {339} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {New Chiefs}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Poolechester Dynasty to New Chiefs or from East Rovers to Poolechester Dynasty?
NC.A: The flow from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {New Chiefs} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from New Chiefs to East Rovers, from East Rovers to Poolechester Dynasty, or from New Chiefs to Poolechester Dynasty?
NC.A: The flow from {New Chiefs} to {East Rovers} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Poolechester Dynasty}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {East Rovers} and {New Chiefs}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Rebeccaview Dolphins, Arc East Rovers, Arc New Chiefs, Arc Poolechester Dynasty, Arc Bensonborough Storm}.
